alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 28 at 11:17PM MST until January 29 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...Curry County, Roosevelt County, Eastern San Miguel County, Far Northeast Highlands, and Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. A very light glaze of ice accumulation may result in slick travel conditions, especially over bridges, culverts, and other elevated surfaces.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Roosevelt County
